summit.multiview_platform.multiview_classifiers.early_fusion_lasso

early_fusion_lasso

classifier_class_name = 'EarlyFusionLasso'
class EarlyFusionLasso(random_state=None, alpha=1.0, max_iter=10, warm_start=False, **kwargs)

BaseMultiviewClassifier base of Multiview classifiers

Parameters:

random_state (int seed, RandomState instance, or None (default=None)) – The seed of the pseudo random number multiview_generator to use when shuffling the data.

param_names = ['max_iter', 'alpha', 'random_state']
